messages.title: Vote for
messages.content: Only Labour's Fleur Anderson can stop the Conservatives in Putney.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Stop Brexit and Remain in the EU
keyPolicies.policyDescription: This is a time to stand up and be counted. Vote for me and I will vote for a People's Vote and to stop Brexit.
After 9 years of Conservative-Lib Dem Austerity, our NHS is underfunded and under threat. Only Labour will protect our NHS.
Climate change is a clear and present threat. I will fight to take urgent action to cut carbon emissions and clean up our air.
Build more social and affordable housing and stop no-fault evictions for renters.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only a vote for Fleur Anderson will stop the Conservatives in Putney this time round.

issues.brexitEurope: Vote for me and I will vote for a People's Vote and to stop Brexit.
issues.environment: Climate change is a clear and present threat. I will fight to take urgent action to cut carbon emissions and clean up our air.
issues.health: After 9 years of Conservative-Lib Dem Austerity, our NHS is underfunded and under threat. Only Labour will protect our NHS.

contactInformation.address: FREEPOST Putney Labour, 35 Felsham Road, SW15 1AY

images.caption: Fleur Anderson has led international development campaigns around the world and is active in local campaigns. As an active local councilor, she listens and takes action for residents.

examples: After 9 years of Conservative-Lib Dem Austerity, our NHS is underfunded and under threat.
The 2017 General Election Result in Putney was very close.
Only Labour's Fleur Anderson can stop the Conservatives in Putney.
This is a time to stand up and be counted.
Climate change is a clear and present threat.
Only Labour will protect our NHS.
Build more social and affordable housing and stop no-fault evictions for renters.

Vote for me and I will vote for a People's Vote and to stop Brexit.
After 9 years of Conservative-Lib Dem Austerity, our NHS is underfunded and under threat. Only Labour will protect our NHS.
